## [v2.2.0](https://github.com/zenstruck/foundry/releases/tag/v2.2.0)

* fa1d527 minor: misc fixes for sca (#705) by @nikophil
* 0d570cc refactor: fix proxy system and introduce psalm extension (#704) by @nikophil
